Quick search

Job¶

class api.job.Job(base_url, session, token)¶

Setup and run jobs and tasks

add_job(workspace_id, job_name, interval_unit='on_demand', interval_value=0, next_run='')¶

Adding a job to a workspace with specified configuration

Parameters:
  • workspace_id – id of the workspace where the job to be created
  • job_name – name of the job that to be created
  • interval_unit – units on_demand or in weeks days and hours
  • interval_value – how many times should it run
  • next_run – when should the next run happen
Returns:

Job info of the new added one
add_sqlworkfile_task(workspace_id, job_name, sql_workfile_id)¶

Add a Sql Workfile task to a job

Parameters:
  • workspace_id – Id of the workspace for the job
  • job_name – Name of the job for which the task is to be added
  • sql_workfile_id – Id of the sql workfile to be added as a task
Returns:

Information of the new added task
add_workfile_task(workspace_id, job_name, workfile_id, task_type)¶

Add a task to a job

Parameters:
  • workspace_id – Id of the workspace for the job
  • job_name – Name of the job for which the task is to be added
  • workfile_id – Id of the workfile to be added as a task
  • task_type – task type could be run_work_flow or run_sql_workfile
Returns:

Info of the new added task
add_workflow_task(workspace_id, job_name, workflow_id)¶

Add a workflow task to a job

Parameters:
  • workspace_id – Id of the workspace for the job
  • job_name – Name of the job for which the task is to be added
  • workflow_id – Id of the workflow to be added as a task
Returns:

Info of the new added task
delete_job_from_workspace(workspace_id, job_name)¶

Delete job from a workspace

Parameters:
  • workspace_id – Id of the workspace to be deleted in
  • job_name – name of the job to delete
Returns:

response for the delete action
delete_job_from_workspace_if_exists(workspace_id, job_name)¶

Delete job from a workspace if the job exists. Skip if job doesn’t exist

Parameters:
  • workspace_id – Id of the workspace to be deleted in
  • job_name – name of the job to delete
Returns:

response for the delete action if job exists
delete_task(workspace_id, job_name, task_name)¶

Delete a task from the job on a workspace

Parameters:
  • workspace_id – Id of the workspace from which the task has to be deleted
  • job_name – Name of the job to from which the task is to be deleted
  • task_name – Name of the task
Returns:

Response of the delete action

get_jobs_list(workspace_id, per_page=50)¶

Get a list of jobs from a workspace

Parameters:
  • workspace_id – Id of the workspace to query on
  • per_page – How many jobs to search for each query
Returns:

Returns the list of Jobs.
